channel.title: Need help finding a game
channel.description:
Ok. I just had a flashback of a GREAT game I played with a couple of friends a long time ago. It was browser based and multiplayer. You were in like a pit of mud or ground or whatever and you had weapons to dig/blow through it. You tried to find the other person and eliminate him while navigating through the ground.
I know it's kind of vague, but if any of you happen to know a game like it please tell me :x
Btw, it's kind of retroish, and it's not 3d. The only thing I really remember about it is that you can use a grapple hook to climb back up...but thats it :(

item.title: Need help finding a game
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

LieroXtreme is so much fun over internet. I strongly suggest trying all wierd mods out.

Read full topic

You might also like Soldat, same type of game.

It’s great fun. Time to procrastinate
